@app.route('/soap/inventory', methods=['POST'])
def handle_soap_request():

    envelope = etree.fromstring(soap_body)

import asyncio
import aioamqp

async def publish_inventory_update(product_id, quantity):
    transport, protocol = await aioamqp.connect('amqp://localhost')
    channel = await protocol.channel()
    
    await channel.exchange_declare('inventory', 'topic')
    message_body = f'{{"product_id": "{product_id}", "quantity": {quantity}}}'
    
    await channel.basic_publish(
        message_body,
        exchange_name='inventory',
        routing_key=f'product.{product_id}.updated'
    )
    await protocol.close()
    transport.close()

    server.wait_for_termination()

class NotificationService:
    def __init__(self, config):
        self.config = config
    
    def send_password_reset_email(self, user_email, reset_token):
        reset_link = f"https://app.example.com/reset?token={reset_token}"
        email_content = f"Click here to reset your password: {reset_link}"
        
        with smtplib.SMTP(self.config.SMTP_HOST, self.config.SMTP_PORT) as server:
            server.starttls()
            server.login(self.config.SMTP_USER, self.config.SMTP_PASSWORD)
            
            msg = MIMEText(email_content, 'html')
            msg['Subject'] = 'Password Reset Request'
            msg['From'] = self.config.FROM_EMAIL
            msg['To'] = user_email
            server.send_message(msg)

code_snippet:
func (h *ProductHandler) GetProduct(w http.ResponseWriter, r *http.Request) {
	productID := mux.Vars(r)["id"]
	cacheKey := "product:" + productID
	if cachedData, found := h.cache.Get(cacheKey); found {
		w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
		w.Write(cachedData.([]byte))
		return
	}
	product := h.service.FetchProduct(productID)
	response, _ := json.Marshal(product)
	h.cache.Set(cacheKey, response, 5*time.Minute)
	w.Header().Set("Content-Type", "application/json")
	w.Write(response)
}

import com.rabbitmq.client.ConnectionFactory
import com.rabbitmq.client.Channel

class NotificationService {
  def sendEmailNotification(userId: String, message: String): Unit = {
    val factory = new ConnectionFactory()
    val connection = factory.newConnection()
    val channel = connection.createChannel()
    val queueName = "email-notifications"
    channel.queueDeclare(queueName, false, false, false, null)
    val payload = s"$userId:$message"
    channel.basicPublish("", queueName, null, payload.getBytes)
    connection.close()
  }
}

import cats.effect.IO
import courier._

object ReportGenerator {
  def sendMonthlyReport(recipients: List[String]): IO[Unit] = {
    val reportData = generateReport()
    val smtpConfig = Smtp("smtp.company.org", 587)
      .auth(true)
      .as("reports@company.org", "password123")
      .startTls(true)()
    
    val envelope = Envelope
      .from("reports@company.org".addr)
      .to(recipients.map(_.addr): _*)
      .subject("Monthly Analytics Report")
      .content(Text(reportData))
    
    IO.fromFuture(IO(smtpConfig.send(envelope)))
  }
}

class OrderProcessor
  def process_order(order)
    # Store order in cache for quick lookup
    cache_key = "pending_order:#{order.id}"
    $redis.hset(cache_key, order.to_hash)
    $redis.expire(cache_key, 1800)
    
    # Process payment
    payment_result = PaymentGateway.charge(order.total)
    
    if payment_result.success?
      $redis.del(cache_key)
      order.mark_as_paid!
    end
  end
end

class MessageConsumer {
    public function consume($message) {
        $redis = Redis::connection();
        $processedKey = "processed_msg_" . $message->getId();
        if ($redis->exists($processedKey)) {
            return false;
        }
        $this->processMessage($message);
        $redis->setex($processedKey, 3600, 'true');
        return true;
    }
}

    private $cache;
    
    public function getUser($userId) {
        $cacheKey = "user:" . $userId;
        $userData = $this->cache->get($cacheKey);
        if (!$userData) {
            $userData = $this->database->fetchUser($userId);
            $this->cache->set($cacheKey, $userData, 3600);
        }
        return $userData;
    }
}

class WebhookProcessor {
    public function forwardToSSEGateway($webhookData) {
        $payload = ['event_type' => 'server-sent-events', 'payload' => $webhookData];
        $context = stream_context_create([
            'http' => [

            ]
        ]);
        return file_get_contents('https://gateway.example.com/sse', false, $context);
    }
}

<?php
class BackupManager {
    private function transferBackupViaFtp($backupFile) {
        $ftpServer = 'backup.storage.com';
        $resource = ftp_connect($ftpServer, 21, 30);
        ftp_login($resource, $this->ftpUser, $this->ftpPassword);
        ftp_mkdir($resource, '/backups/' . date('Y-m-d'));
        return ftp_put($resource, '/backups/' . date('Y-m-d') . '/backup.tar.gz', $backupFile, FTP_BINARY);
    }
}

IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. SECURE-TRANSFER.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 SFTP-SERVER PIC X(30) VALUE 'secure.bank.net'.
       01 TRANSFER-STATUS PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       PERFORM SFTP-UPLOAD-TRANSACTION
       IF TRANSFER-STATUS = 00
           DISPLAY 'Secure transfer completed'
       END-IF.
       STOP RUN.

label: DEFINITE_OUTWARD
code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. DATA-SYNC.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 SYNC-RESULT PIC 9(2).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       EXEC SQL
           INSERT INTO TRANSFER_LOG VALUES ('STARTING SFTP SYNC')
       END-EXEC
       CALL 'SFTP-CLIENT' USING 'DOWNLOAD' 'customer-data.xml'
       MOVE RETURN-CODE TO SYNC-RESULT.
       STOP RUN.

label: DEFINITE_OUTWARD
code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. ARCHIVE-REPORTS.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 ARCHIVE-SERVER PIC X(40) VALUE 'archive.corp.com'.
       01 REPORT-FILE PIC X(60).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       MOVE 'MONTHLY-SUMMARY.RPT' TO REPORT-FILE
       PERFORM FTP-ARCHIVE-ROUTINE
       DISPLAY 'Report archived successfully'.
       STOP RUN.
       FTP-ARCHIVE-ROUTINE.
           CALL 'FTP-SEND' USING ARCHIVE-SERVER REPORT-FILE.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. CONFIG-SETUP.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 FTP-SERVER-CONFIG.
          05 FTP-HOST        PIC X(50) VALUE 'ftp.example.com'.
          05 FTP-PORT        PIC 9(4) VALUE 21.
          05 FTP-USERNAME    PIC X(20) VALUE 'admin'.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       DISPLAY 'Configuration loaded'.
       STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. FILE-TRANSFER-TEST.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-SFTP-MOCK-DATA.
          05 WS-MOCK-RESULT  PIC X(10) VALUE 'SUCCESS'.
          05 WS-TEST-FILE    PIC X(30) VALUE 'test-file.txt'.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       DISPLAY 'Mock SFTP test completed'.
       STOP RUN.

label: NOT_DEFINITE
code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. INTERFACE-DEF.
       DATA DIVISION.
       LINKAGE SECTION.
       01 LS-FTP-INTERFACE.
          05 LS-OPERATION    PIC X(10).
          05 LS-FILENAME     PIC X(50).
          05 LS-STATUS       PIC X(5).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION USING LS-FTP-INTERFACE.
       MOVE 'READY' TO LS-STATUS.
       EXIT PROGRAM.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. COPY-DEFINITIONS.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
           COPY SFTP-CONSTANTS.
       01 WS-TRANSFER-STATUS  PIC X(20).
       01 WS-ERROR-MESSAGE    PIC X(100).
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       MOVE 'INITIALIZED' TO WS-TRANSFER-STATUS.
       STOP RUN.

code_snippet:
IDENTIFICATION DIVISION.
       PROGRAM-ID. TYPE-DEFINITIONS.
       DATA DIVISION.
       WORKING-STORAGE SECTION.
       01 WS-CONNECTION-TYPES.
          05 WS-HTTP-TYPE     PIC X(10) VALUE 'HTTP'.
          05 WS-FTP-TYPE      PIC X(10) VALUE 'FTP'.
          05 WS-DATABASE-TYPE PIC X(10) VALUE 'DB2'.
       PROCEDURE DIVISION.
       DISPLAY 'Connection types defined'.
       STOP RUN.
